channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: AP Week in Pictures: Global
item.description: Sept. 6-12, 2024Former President Donald Trump points, Taylor Swift arrives at the MTV Awards and people watch the debate between the presidential nominees.

item.title: A scenic California mountain town walloped by a blizzard is now threatened by wildfire
item.description: RUNNING SPRINGS, Calif. (AP) — In the Southern California mountain town of Running Springs, residents live between two scenic lake resorts — a seemingly serene spot but one also caught between the swings of devastating winter snowstorms and menacing summer wildfires.

item.title: 1 person shot during scuffle at pro-Israel rally in Boston suburb, authorities say
item.description: A pro-Israel rally in the Boston suburb of Newton turned violent when a passerby was shot during a scuffle after confronting the group of demonstrators.
